title: The Emerald Empress: Diamond & Emerald Nakshi Haaram
features: This magnificent Haaram features a classic Telugu arrowhead design. The centerpiece showcases exquisite Nakshi work with intricately detailed peacocks (Mayura) flanking a central emerald. The pendant is a stunning medallion, also set with emeralds and diamonds, framed with delicate gold bead drops. The necklace features a unique pattern of diamonds, carefully set for maximum brilliance. The Emeralds have carefully been chosen to give a luxurious touch.
occasions: and high-profile traditional events. An heirloom piece fit for Seemantham
description: A timeless embodiment of South Indian elegance and craftsmanship. The combination of Nakshi work, brilliant diamonds, and vibrant emeralds makes this piece a statement of luxury and tradition. This necklace is a fusion of traditional Telugu design with modern diamond cutting for an alluring sparkle. Durable and crafted to last generations.
